content.question: A firmâ€™s decision to hire a factor of production DOES NOT depend on which of the following?

choices.label: The price of the product produced by the factor input
The average product of the factor input
The price of the factor input
The demand for the product the factor produces
The marginal product of the factor input

content.answer: The average product of the factor input

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
